translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一般人女性の中ではすごい有名ですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She's quite famous among ordinary women."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子育てと教育、それからジェンダー論の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Childcare and education, and also gender theory—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 権威なんですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she's an authority in those fields."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女性誌のコラムとか、山ほど書いてるっすよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She writes tons of columns for women's magazines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悩み相談に時事ネタに……講演もいっぱい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Advice columns, current affairs... and gives many lectures."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………お前、知ってたか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Did you know that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知りませんでした……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I didn't know...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 名前は見た事あるんですけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've seen the name before, but—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女性誌とか読まないので……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really read women's magazines..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、そうだ総統さん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that's right, Commander!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ、また来た……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, here she comes again..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お城の中、拝見させて頂いたのだけど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I had a look inside the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても綺麗で設備も行き届いているけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's very beautiful and well-equipped,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 保育園の設備が少し足りてないんじゃないかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I think the nursery facilities are a bit lacking."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほ、保育園って……あのガキどものか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-Nursery...? You mean for those brats?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええそうよ！　担当のええと、徳川さん？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, exactly! The person in charge, um, Tokugawa-san?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとお手伝いの子たちも頑張っているけれど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the helpers are doing their best too,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 環境を整えて、もっと質を向上できると思うわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I think the environment could be improved and the quality raised more!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でもね、女性だけでなにもかもできると思っちゃ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you see, thinking women alone can do everything—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダメなの。男性もね、同じように子供を育てる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's no good. Men also need to have the same awareness about raising children.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意識が必要なの。お父さんも一緒になって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fathers have to join in too..."
"G-Guh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦いの場という事は分かっているのよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I know this is a battlefield, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも子供の未来のための戦争でしょう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But this is a war for the children's future, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤ちゃんを立派に育てるのも重要だと思うわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think raising babies properly is important too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ねえ、総統さんも日々お忙しいと思うけれど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Commander, I know you're busy every day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを疎かにしては残念な事になってしまうわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but neglecting this will lead to unfortunate results!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それで……あ、総統さん！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So then... ah, Commander!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あらやだ、どちらにいかれるの？　ねぇ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh my, where are you going? Hey!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは逃げ出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance ran away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう……大変ねぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see... that's hard, isn't it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご苦労なさってるのねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're going through a lot..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい……いえ、そんなに大変なことでは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes... no, it's not that difficult...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう、慣れましたから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm used to it already..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パトリシアが、通りすがりのシィルに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patricia forcibly started giving advice to Seal, who was passing by.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お悩み相談を（強引に）受けていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (She was forcibly receiving a worry consultation.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でもお嬢さん。今の時代は女性が女性らしく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But miss, these days it's hard for women to live in a truly feminine way,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生きていくのが難しい時代だけど、だからこそ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but that's precisely why living properly and raising children is important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃんと生きて、子供を育てるのが大事なの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's important to live rightly and raise children."
"Y-Yes..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統さんという素晴らしい旦那さんをお持ちで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You have a wonderful husband like the Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大変なことも色々あると思うわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I imagine you have many difficulties.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええ、うちも主人には振り回されるし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, I get tossed around by my husband too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、旦那さんって……えへへ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-Husband, huh... hehehe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょーーーっと待ったあーーーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Waaaaait just a momeeeeent!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞き捨てならないわね！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't just let that go unheard!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰が正妻だと思ってるのよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who do you think the legitimate wife is!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あらリアさん。ご無沙汰ねぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Ria-san. Long time no see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この間の懇親会、ありがとうねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks for the social gathering the other day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パトリシア先生！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Professor Patricia!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一般人女性の中ではすごい有名ですよ。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子育てと教育、それからジェンダー論の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Childcare and education, and also gender theory—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 権威なんですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she's an authority in those fields."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女性誌のコラムとか、山ほど書いてるっすよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She writes tons of columns for women's magazines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悩み相談に時事ネタに……講演もいっぱい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Advice columns, current affairs... and gives many lectures."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 名前は見た事あるんですけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've seen the name before, but—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女性誌とか読まないので……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really read women's magazines..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that's right, Commander!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ、また来た……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, here she comes again..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I had a look inside the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても綺麗で設備も行き届いているけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's very beautiful and well-equipped,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 保育園の設備が少し足りてないんじゃないかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I think the nursery facilities are a bit lacking."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほ、保育園って……あのガキどものか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-Nursery...? You mean for those brats?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええそうよ！　担当のええと、徳川さん？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, exactly! The person in charge, um, Tokugawa-san?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとお手伝いの子たちも頑張っているけれど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the helpers are doing their best too,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 環境を整えて、もっと質を向上できると思うわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I think the environment could be improved and the quality raised more!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でもね、女性だけでなにもかもできると思っちゃ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you see, thinking women alone can do everything—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダメなの。男性もね、同じように子供を育てる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's no good. Men also need to have the same awareness about raising children.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意識が必要なの。お父さんも一緒になって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fathers have to join in too..."
"G-Guh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦いの場という事は分かっているのよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I know this is a battlefield, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも子供の未来のための戦争でしょう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But this is a war for the children's future, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤ちゃんを立派に育てるのも重要だと思うわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think raising babies properly is important too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ねえ、総統さんも日々お忙しいと思うけれど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Commander, I know you're busy every day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを疎かにしては残念な事になってしまうわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but neglecting this will lead to unfortunate results!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それで……あ、総統さん！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So then... ah, Commander!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あらやだ、どちらにいかれるの？　ねぇ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh my, where are you going? Hey!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは逃げ出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance ran away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう……大変ねぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see... that's hard, isn't it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご苦労なさってるのねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're going through a lot..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい……いえ、そんなに大変なことでは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes... no, it's not that difficult...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう、慣れましたから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm used to it already..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パトリシアが、通りすがりのシィルに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patricia forcibly started giving advice to Seal, who was passing by.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お悩み相談を（強引に）受けていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (She was forcibly receiving a worry consultation.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でもお嬢さん。今の時代は女性が女性らしく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But miss, these days it's hard for women to live in a truly feminine way,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生きていくのが難しい時代だけど、だからこそ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but that's precisely why living properly and raising children is important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃんと生きて、子供を育てるのが大事なの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's important to live rightly and raise children."
"Y-Yes..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統さんという素晴らしい旦那さんをお持ちで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You have a wonderful husband like the Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大変なことも色々あると思うわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I imagine you have many difficulties.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええ、うちも主人には振り回されるし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, I get tossed around by my husband too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、旦那さんって……えへへ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-Husband, huh... hehehe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょーーーっと待ったあーーーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Waaaaait just a momeeeeent!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞き捨てならないわね！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't just let that go unheard!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰が正妻だと思ってるのよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who do you think the legitimate wife is!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あらリアさん。ご無沙汰ねぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Ria-san. Long time no see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この間の懇親会、ありがとうねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks for the social gathering the other day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パトリシア先生！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Professor Patricia!"
